name: Sentry
description: Energy manipulator unit. Can use Force Field, Guardian Shield and Hallucination

abilities.name: Force Field
abilities.description: Barrier that lasts 11 seconds and impedes movement of ground units. Massive units will shatter Force Fields on contact.

abilities.name: Guardian Shield
abilities.description: Creates a range 4 aura that reduces incoming ranged damage to friendly units by 2. Lasts 11 seconds.

abilities.name: Hallucination
abilities.description: Creates hallucinations that cannot use active abilities, cannot deal damage and die more easily. Hallucinations last 43 seconds. Enemy detectors reveal hallucinations.
